mapper.insert: insert into tb_cr_user_score(user_id, username, major_id, total_score, approve_count, best_count, create_by, create_time, del_flag) values(#{userId}, #{username}, #{majorId}, #{delta}, #{approveInc}, #{bestInc}, #{operator}, #{now}, '0') on duplicate key update total_score = total_score + values(total_score), approve_count = approve_count + values(approve_count), best_count = best_count + values(best_count), update_by = values(create_by), update_time = values(create_time)
mapper.select:
select s.*, m.major_name, row_number() over(order by s.total_score desc, s.id asc) as `rank` from tb_cr_user_score s left join tb_major m on s.major_id = m.id
s.del_flag = '0' and s.major_id = #{majorId} and s.major_id = 0
order by s.total_score desc, s.id asc
